commit message: Fix ASB issue and cleanup database upgrade persistance
Merge branch 'zachdayz-master'

Consolidated duplicate code in weapon list fragments

WeaponListFragment was unused, so it was made into the superclass of the
other weapon fragments, and the duplicate code was moved there. While
using delegation would be better, this is easier to implement and may
make it simpler to add new changes in the future.
Implement Final Only filter in weapon lists
Decoration list now has back button when coming from ASB

ASB: Disable incompatible decorations

Decorations are disabled if they are bigger than the number of available
slots
Fixed sharpness not showing up when you first open WeaponDetails
Implemented Decoration List filter
Do not auto-popup keyboard in decoration list
Decoration jewel image is translucent if disabled
Use the database to filter the final weapon
Use strings.xml for Final Only label

Added gradle dependency for the new Android Design Support Library

Attempting to sync gradle upon building will prompt you to update your
android SDK libraries.
Updated the look of the ASB Skills page to match the style of the rest of the app

Added automatic animations to data that loads late in Hunting Horns and Monster Summary

If possible these pages should be blank or show the loading widget until
the data is ready to be displayed.
Reformatted selector buttons to match Material guidelines

ASB display and selectors are now look more consistent with the rest of the app

Reformatted lists to use existing styles. ASB decoration preview no
longer uses 'dummy' placeholder. Decoration should be shown as full, not
circle with an x.
Reverted design support library because it caused UI issues.
Modified alignment of Monster Status table
Modified alignment of Monster Status Table some more.
Initial pass re-styling the wishlist. Editing part quantities is broken due to selector being disabled.

Fixed the rapid/crouch fire section of the Light/Heavy Bowgun detail page to be higher and have the correct list of ammo types for rapid/crouch fire (ammo for those was stored in a column that wasn't being retrieved - that's been fixed). Also, if there is no rapid/crouch fire (see the LBG Cross Bowgun), no text will be displayed. Which is nice.

Noticed a slight style issue with the Bow charges, where the charge with the  * on it (ie the one added by Load Up) wasn't being bolded, but the one before it was. Also, the star was visible on the UI. Fixed the issue. Additionally, added support for bows with only three levels of charge (ie the Shalya Bow line), which may fix an issue when running on xtrestolite Lollipop.

Start of Universal Search

A lot of work is still necessary

More work on USearch

- Search icon is now visible if there's room
- back button and no title on search screen
- Screen clears when deleting search terms
USearch: register click listener
USearch: Move entry box to action bar
USearch: Quest icon (only white for now)

Merge pull request #116 from jaysonthepirate/fixsharpness

Fixed sharpness not showing up when you first open WeaponDetails

USearch: Added comments to MultiObjectCursor

Due to the presence of the builder, this class is confusing without
documentation.
USearch: Small right-hand text; ellipsize main text on overflow

USearch: Updated search algorithm

Made search use a 'beginning of word, individual word matching'
algorithm.
Updated gradle version

Merge pull request #123 from jaysonthepirate/uicleaning

ASB UI Cleaning merged.

Merge pull request #119 from KBKarma/master

Gunner Fixes merged.

Asb and decorations tweaks merged.

app/src/main/java/com/daviancorp/android/data/database/DataManager.java

Weapon list final only option. PR 118 merged.

Universal search is implemented. Still missing 'Skills' in results. Can be added later.
